div.span: Chinook High School is committed to providing the best possible opportunities to all of our students. Our goal is to provide each student with the necessary skills to attend a post-secondary school or to enter into the job market.

p.span: Creating and sustaining an environment that fosters learning is our goal at Chinook Public Schools. Our experienced staff and administration, help ensure that your child is achieving the highest academic results.

div.p: At CHS, we believe in taking pride in yourself, having a desire to learn and achieving excellence in everything. Chinook High School is committed to providing the best possible opportunities to all of our students. Our goal is to provide each student with the necessary skills to attend a post-secondary school or to enter right into the job market. In order to reach this goal, students must work with staff and administration in planning. Students must also treat themselves and all others with the respect necessary for all to work toward individual goals. We look forward to our students achieving success, welcome to CHS!

ul.li: Shug, the CHS mascot has a facebook page. Check it out.

Alert Sense – is now being used by the school to inform parents of school closures due to weather and or emergencies. If you would like more information or to sign up use these links:
